input.sentences: found some old pictures of my wedding day . my husband on the right .
i was so happy then . i do n't know what happened .
this was the happiest day of my life . now i am nothing .
my girlfriends all went on to do great things and i 'm stuck here in a small town | living in a trailer .
i remember we used to laugh and joke about everything . i do n't even remember the last night i chuckled .
output.sentences: Phil was so excited to become a husband and wanted me to take a ton of pictures of their wedding.
The whole night was fun but I think Jenny couldn't have been more happy that she happened to catch the bouquet.
This was clearly the happiest day of Phil's life.
Most of the wedding went well besides the fact that the trailer carrying the motercycle the couple would drive away on got stuck in town.
The funniest part of the wedding was the wrestling match they had that night that made everyone laugh to the point of tears.
